io.leonis.algieba.spatial

Class BoundaryPotentialField

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.algieba.spatial.BoundaryPotentialField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineIntegral, PotentialField

    public class BoundaryPotentialField
extends java.lang.Object
implements PotentialField
    The Class BoundaryPotentialField. This class represents a PotentialField which bounds a rectangle such that the potential approximates zero for any point on the field and approximates infinity for any point outside the field.

      • getLineIntegral

        upperBound - The upper bound of the integral.
        Returns:
